person.persName: Peter S. Hamlin (Calloway County, KY, farmer and prov govt)

body.p: Calloway County, Kentucky, farmer and provisional government convention member. Virginia native. Married to Virginia Hamlin. Father of Richard Hamlin, Mary Hamlin, Thomas Hamlin, William Hamlin, Charles Hamlin, Minerva Hamlin, and Ann Hamlin. Owned eighteen enslaved persons in Calloway County in 1850. Farmer in Calloway County in 1850. Owned eighteen enslaved persons on Calloway County in 1860. Farmer in Calloway County in 1860. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861.
